title: Mario Mutsch
snippet: Mutsch's club career spanned over a decade across multiple European leagues, including stints in Belgium, Germany, France, and Switzerland, before he transitioned into coaching roles within Luxembourg's youth and senior setups.[1][2][3] Mutsch began his professional journey in Belgium's lower divisions with clubs such as Spa FC (2002–2005) and Union La Calamine (2005–2006), followed by a brief reserve stint at Alemannia Aachen in Germany (2006–2007)....

title: Mario Mutsch - Wikipedia
snippet: Vith, Mutsch started his career at Belgian lower leagues sides Spa and Kelmis (La Calamine) before heading to Germany to play for the Alemannia Aachen reserve team.
